languages.text: "Эй, ледышка... ты напрасно себе врешь. Чувствуешь же, как сквозит. Не можешь не чувствовать. Колдовство тут буквально в воздухе разлито. Сначала в системе эти протубертанцы, теперь тут эти красавчики... что-то тут издырявило завесу между реальным миром и варпом. Что-то или кто-то".

"Hey, iceman... No need to lie to yourself. You can feel it. There's no way you can't feel it. I can practically taste it in the air — sorcery. First, we had those flares in the system, now this comely lot... Something here has been poking holes in the veil between realspace and the warp. Something or someone."
languages.original_text: "Эй, ледышка... ты напрасно себе врешь. Чувствуешь же, как сквозит. Не можешь не чувствовать. Колдовство тут буквально в воздухе разлито. Сначала в системе эти протубертанцы, теперь тут эти красавчики... что-то тут издырявило завесу между реальным миром и варпом. Что-то или кто-то".

First, we had those flares in the system, now this comely lot... Something here has been poking holes in the veil between realspace and the warp. Something or someone."

First, we had those flares in the system, now this comely lot... Something here has been poking holes in the veil between realspace and the warp. Something or someone."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “嘿，冰人儿……别再自欺欺人了。你已经感觉到了，你不可能感觉不到。我都差不多能在空气中尝到它的味道了，这是巫术的味道。先是这个星系爆发了耀斑，现在又来了这么个美人儿……这里有什么东西，在真实世界与亚空间之间开了洞。有什么东西，或是有什么人。”
languages.original_text: "Hey, iceman... No need to lie to yourself. You can feel it. There's no way you can't feel it. I can practically taste it in the air — sorcery. First, we had those flares in the system, now this comely lot... Something here has been poking holes in the veil between realspace and the warp. Something or someone."

traits.locale_text: “嘿，冷冰冰的家伙……别再自欺欺人了。你已经感觉到了，你不可能感觉不到。我都差不多能在空气中尝到它的味道了，这是巫术的味道。先是星系里发生了耀斑，现在又来了这么个美人儿……这里有什么东西，在真实世界与亚空间之间开了洞。有什么东西，或是有什么人。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Eh, hombre de hielo... No hace falta que se engañe. Puede sentirlo. Sé que sí. Yo prácticamente puedo olerlo en el ambiente: es hechicería. Lo primero fueron esas anomalías en el sistema, ahora estas preciosidades... Algo aquí ha estado abriendo agujeros entre el espacio real y la disformidad. Algo o alguien».
languages.original_text: "Hey, iceman... No need to lie to yourself. You can feel it. There's no way you can't feel it. I can practically taste it in the air — sorcery. First, we had those flares in the system, now this comely lot... Something here has been poking holes in the veil between realspace and the warp. Something or someone."

traits.locale_text: «Eh, hombre de hielo... No hace falta que se engañe. Puede sentirlo. Sé que sí. Yo prácticamente puedo olerlo en el ambiente: es hechicería. Lo primero fueron esas anomalías en el sistema, ahora estas preciosidades... Algo aquí ha estado abriendo agujeros entre el espacio real y la disformidad. Algo o alguien».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ねえ、アイスマン…自分に嘘をつく必要はないわ。あなたはそれを感じることができる。感じられないはずがないの。あたいには空気の中にただよってるのを味わうことができるほどの—魔術。まず、あたいたちはシステム内にその揺らめきを持っていたわ。今は、この美しい区画で…ここでリアルスペースと歪みの間のヴェールに穴を開けたの。何か、または誰かがね」
languages.original_text: "Hey, iceman... No need to lie to yourself. You can feel it. There's no way you can't feel it. I can practically taste it in the air — sorcery. First, we had those flares in the system, now this comely lot... Something here has been poking holes in the veil between realspace and the warp. Something or someone."

traits.locale_text: 「ねえ、アイスマン…自分に嘘をつく必要はないわ。あなたはそれを感じることができる。感じられないはずがないの。あたいには空気の中にただよってるのを味わうことができるほどの—魔術。まず、あたいたちはシステム内にその揺らめきを持っていたわ。今は、この美しい区画で…ここでリアルスペースと歪みの間のヴェールに穴を開けたの。何か、または誰かがね」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Pas la peine de vous mentir, inquisiteur. Vous le sentez, c'est obligé. Il y a de la sorcellerie dans l'air, elle est presque palpable. D'abord ces anomalies dans le système et maintenant, cette bande de gais lurons... Quelque chose ici s'est amusé à percer le voile qui sépare l'espace réel du Warp. Quelque chose, ou quelqu'un. »
languages.original_text: "Hey, iceman... No need to lie to yourself. You can feel it. There's no way you can't feel it. I can practically taste it in the air — sorcery. First, we had those flares in the system, now this comely lot... Something here has been poking holes in the veil between realspace and the warp. Something or someone."

traits.locale_text: « Pas la peine de vous mentir, inquisiteur. Vous le sentez, c'est obligé. Il y a de la sorcellerie dans l'air, elle est presque palpable. D'abord ces anomalies dans le système et maintenant, cette bande de gais lurons... Quelque chose ici s'est amusé à percer le voile qui sépare l'espace réel du Warp. Quelque chose, ou quelqu'un. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Hey, Eismann ... Kein Grund, Euch selbst zu belügen. Ihr könnt es spüren. Es kann nicht sein, dass Ihr es nicht spürt. Ich rieche es förmlich in der Luft – Hexerei. Erst dieses Flackern im System, jetzt dieser attraktive Haufen ... Irgendetwas hat hier Löcher in den Schleier zwischen Realraum und Warp gebohrt. Irgendetwas oder irgendjemand."
languages.original_text: "Hey, iceman... No need to lie to yourself. You can feel it. There's no way you can't feel it. I can practically taste it in the air — sorcery. First, we had those flares in the system, now this comely lot... Something here has been poking holes in the veil between realspace and the warp. Something or someone."

traits.locale_text: "Hey, Eismann ... Kein Grund, Euch selbst zu belügen. Ihr könnt es spüren. Es kann nicht sein, dass Ihr es nicht spürt. Ich rieche es förmlich in der Luft – Hexerei. Erst dieses Flackern im System, jetzt dieser attraktive Haufen ... Irgendetwas hat hier Löcher in den Schleier zwischen Realraum und Warp gebohrt. Irgendetwas oder irgendjemand."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Buz küpü, kendini kandırmana gerek yok. Sen de hissedebiliyorsun. Hissetmiyor olman mümkün değil. Resmen sahirlik kokuyor. Önce karşımıza şu sistemdeki alevler çıkıyor, şimdi de zarafetten kırılan bu topluluk. Gerçekuzay ve öteboyut arasındaki örtüde delikler açılmış. Bir şeyler veya birileri açmış."
languages.original_text: "Hey, iceman... No need to lie to yourself. You can feel it. There's no way you can't feel it. I can practically taste it in the air — sorcery. First, we had those flares in the system, now this comely lot... Something here has been poking holes in the veil between realspace and the warp. Something or someone."

traits.locale_text: "Hey, buz küpü, kendini kandırmana gerek yok. Sen de hissedebiliyorsun. Hissetmiyor olman mümkün değil. Resmen havada sahirlik tadı var. Önce karşımıza şu sistemdeki alevler çıkıyor, şimdi de bu zarafetten kırılan topluluk. Buralarda bir şeyler, gerçekuzay ve öteboyut arasındaki örtüde delikler açmış. Bir şeyler veya birileri."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
